sentences: LDC Expert Group (LEG) Chair Laavasa Malua (Samoa) reported on the work of the LEG.
TANZANIA, for the LDCs, underscored the need to operationalize the LDC Fund in the short term to support immediate and urgent needs.
CANADA said that decision guidance should not emphasize any specific adaptation measures as this might prejudge the outcomes of national adaptation programmes of action (NAPAs).
The EU stressed the need to ensure that NAPA implementation enhances synergies with other UN conventions.
